text: The Wikipedia page for podcasting still has some misleading info about how the name was arrived at. How it happened -- I asked, on the community mail list, in September 2004, for ideas. Dannie Gregoire posted the word podcast, and later Adam and I, in the Trade Secrets podcast, decided to go with it. And that's it. That's how podcasting got its name. If you want more info, check out this blog post I wrote in 2015, and this one specifically on the naming, in 2013.
